process.title: Admission Process
process.subtitle: Simple steps to join our school community

step1.title: Application Form
step1.description: Complete and submit the online application form with all required information.

step2.title: Document Submission
step2.description: Submit all required documents including academic records and certificates.

step3.title: Assessment
step3.description: Participate in our assessment process designed to understand your child's needs.

step4.title: Interview
step4.description: Attend a personal interview with our admission committee.

step5.title: Admission Decision
step5.description: Receive admission decision and complete enrollment procedures.

about.title: About Surjomukhi Kindergarten
about.subtitle: A private primary educational institution established in 2004, fostering holistic development through creative and ethical education.
about.description: Surjomukhi Kindergarten is a private primary educational institution established on 01-01-2004 and located at Salauddin Complex, Aona Bazar, Nawabganj, Dhaka-1320. The school offers instruction in the Bangla medium from play group up to Grade 5 and works to foster students' holistic development through creative and ethical education.

ideals.title: Our Ideals
items: Education is the backbone of the nation
Peace is the supreme virtue
Spirit of unity and progress
Building a progressive society through creative education

mission.title: Our Mission
items: Ensure modern, value-based, culturally rooted education for all students
Foster creativity, moral character, and civic values in every learner
Promote sports and cultural practice as integral parts of education
Bring modern education to local residents' doorsteps and spread advanced education
Develop creative human character among students and activate latent talents

vision.title: Our Vision
items: Build a progressive society through creative education
Become a reliable and model local educational institution
Ensure participation of underserved groups and support meritorious students in need
Evolve into a leading local school guided by founding ideals

objectives.title: Our Objectives
items: Bring modern education to local residents' doorsteps and spread advanced education
Develop creative human character among students and activate latent talents
Encourage free thinking, cultural practice, and sportsmanship
Provide moral and human values education and build a knowledge-based nation
Raise awareness among out-of-school populations
Expand quality education among disadvantaged families

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: A journey of educational excellence since 2004.

founded.title: Established in 2004
founded.description: Surjomukhi Kindergarten was established on January 1, 2004, with a commitment to providing quality Bangla medium education from play group to Grade 5.

growth.title: Continuous Development
growth.description: Over the years, we have maintained our commitment to holistic development, combining academic excellence with creative and ethical education in a nurturing environment.

academics.title: Academics
academics.description: Instruction is provided in Bangla medium from play group to Grade 5. Class-wise student numbers are maintained with proper structure.

governance.title: Governance
governance.description: A seven-member governing/management body framework ensures proper administration:

facilities.title: Our Facilities
facilities.subtitle: Comprehensive facilities to support holistic development

items.title: Safe Environment
items.description: Two toilets and safe drinking water available

items.title: Sports Facilities
items.description: 100x60 yards playground for football, cricket, badminton, and chess

items.title: Cultural Programs
items.description: Regular cultural programs, debates, and Cub Scout activities

items.title: Daily Activities
items.description: Daily assemblies and observance of national days

items.title: Library
items.description: Establishing a library as resources allow

items.title: Safety Committee
items.description: Anti-Sexual Harassment Committee with five members

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.address: Salauddin Complex, Aona Bazar, Nawabganj, Dhaka-1320

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Learn about our commitment to providing quality early childhood education
aboutUs.content: Welcome to Surjomukhi Kindergarten, where we believe every child deserves the best start in their educational journey.

founders.title: Our Founders
founders.subtitle: Meet the visionary who established our kindergarten
founders.description: Surjomukhi Kindergarten is a private nursery-to-Grade 5 school established on January 1, 2004, located at Salauddin Complex, Aona Bazar, Nawabganj, Dhaka-1320. The school operates in Bangla medium and aims to provide creative, ethical, and holistic education.

founder.name: Sheikh Imran Mahmud
founder.title: Founder & Proprietor
founder.description: The founder and main initiator of Surjomukhi Kindergarten, who also manages and signs official applications as proprietor or director. Under his leadership, the school has maintained its commitment to providing quality Bangla medium education with a focus on creative, ethical, and holistic development.
founder.vision: To create an educational institution that serves as the backbone of the nation through quality education, fostering peace, unity, and progress in the community.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: Discover our journey of educational excellence since 2004
history.description: Surjomukhi Kindergarten began at the start of 2004 in Aona, Nawabganj, Dhaka. From its inception, the school has provided education for young children from nursery through Grade 5, prioritizing moral values, unity, peace, creativity, and progress.

founding.title: The Beginning
founding.description: Surjomukhi Kindergarten was established on January 1, 2004, in Aona, Nawabganj, Dhaka, with a vision to provide quality Bangla medium education from nursery to Grade 5.

ideals.title: Founding Ideals
ideals.primary: Education is the backbone of the nation
ideals.description: These founding ideals guide the institution to foster a progressive, inclusive society through quality education.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: The institution is structured to serve local community needs and actively supports underprivileged and meritorious students, maintaining focus on moral values, unity, peace, creativity, and progress.

campusTour.title: Campus Tour
campusTour.subtitle: Explore our modern facilities and learning environments

howToApply.title: How to Apply
howToApply.description: Step-by-step guide to the admission process

applyOnline.title: Apply Online
applyOnline.description: Submit your application online for convenience

hero.title: Apply Online
hero.subtitle: Complete your application for admission to Surjomukhi Kindergarten online.

applyOnline.formSubtitle: Please fill out all required fields carefully. You can save your progress and return later if needed.

studentName.label: Child's Full Name
studentName.error: Please enter the child's full name

dateOfBirth.label: Date of Birth
dateOfBirth.error: Please select a valid date of birth
dateOfBirth.ageError: Student must be between 3 and 15 years old

parentEmail.label: Email Address
parentEmail.error: Please enter a valid email address

parentPhone.label: Primary Contact Number
parentPhone.error: Please enter a valid phone number

specialNeeds.label: Special Needs or Medical Conditions
specialNeeds.placeholder: Please describe any special needs or medical conditions

howDidYouHear.label: How did you hear about our school?

termsAccepted.label: I hereby declare that the information provided above is true and complete to the best of my knowledge. I understand that any false information may result in the rejection of this application.
termsAccepted.linkText: I agree to the admission policy and terms and conditions of Surjomukhi Kindergarten.
termsAccepted.error: You must accept the terms and conditions

messages.successDescription: Thank you for your application. We will contact you within 3-5 business days.
messages.errorDescription: Please check your information and try again.
messages.validationError: Please fix the errors in the form

nextSteps.title: What Happens Next?
nextSteps.subtitle: After submitting your online application, here's what you can expect.

steps.title: Confirmation Email
steps.description: You'll receive a confirmation email with your application reference number within 24 hours.

steps.title: Contact from School
steps.description: Our admission team will contact you within 3-5 working days to schedule an assessment.

steps.title: Admission Decision
steps.description: Final admission decision will be communicated within 2 weeks of the assessment.
